Header: Wanni Pregnant Women Provided with Essentials
Content: 56 Division Headquarters of the Security Force Headquarters - Wanni (SFHQ-W) with the sponsorship provided by Mrs M Kolambage of Piliyandala Prasad Textiles distributed parcels of nutrients, clothes and essentials among 50 pregnant women in Nandimithragama, Namalgama, Salalihinigama, Bogaswewa 1, Bogaswewa 2, Kokeliya and Omanthai areas on Tuesday (11). On the guidelines given by Major General Kumudu Perera, Commander, Security Forces - Wanni (SF-W), Major General Prabhath Dematanpitiya, General Officer Commanding, 56 Division initiated the programme considering the poverty factor among those families. Mrs M Kolambage of Piliyandala Prasad Textiles together with Major General Prabhath Dematanpitiya went to above-mentioned villages where mostly resettled people live and handed over those parcels of essentials in order to help them and show the goodwill towards them during the current festive season.
